ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work is dedicated to the memory of Dr. Richard T. Jones (1972â€“2018). Richard was a colleague and close friend to all authors and without his collaborative nature and passion for interdisciplinary research this project would not have been possible. This publication celebrates his career. This work was supported by Shell Research Ltd. and the University of Exeter. Authors wish to acknowledge Angela Elliott (University of Exeter) for aiding with sediment preparation; Jerry Purcell (Shell Global Solutions) for support with 2D-GCMS analysis; Audrey Farbos (Exeter Sequencing Service) for her assistance with preparing DNA sequencing libraries and the Quesnel River Research Centre for their support. We would like to thank Tim Devarenne and Dan Browne (Texas A&M University) for their advice and providing early access to the B. braunii reference genome. DNA Sequencing was performed at the Exeter Sequencing Service and Computational core facilities at the University of Exeter. Medical Research Council Clinical Infrastructure award (MR/M008924/1). Wellcome Trust Institutional Strategic Support Fund (WT097835MF), Wellcome Trust Multi User Equipment Award (WT101650MA) and BBSRC LOLA award (BB/K003240/1).
